```{r a ,message = F,prompt=T, comment = NA,warning = F,message = F, include = T,fig.align='center',out.width ='100%',fig.asp=0.6}
library(ggplot2)
data(diamonds)
knitr::kable(head(diamonds),caption="数据概要")

ggplot(diamonds, aes(carat,price)) +
geom_bin2d() +
facet_wrap(~cut, nrow = 2)

ggplot(diamonds, aes(log(carat),price)) +
geom_point() +
facet_wrap(~cut, nrow = 2)

ggplot(diamonds, aes(carat,log(price))) +
geom_bin2d() +
facet_wrap(~cut, nrow = 2)

ggplot(diamonds, aes(log(carat), log10(price))) +
geom_bin2d() +
facet_wrap(~cut, nrow = 2)
```

```{r b ,message = F,prompt=T, comment = NA,warning = F,message = F, include = T,fig.align='center',out.width ='100%',fig.asp=0.6}
i <- ggplot(economics, aes(date, unemploy))
i + geom_area()

i + geom_line()
```
